data.name: Wildfox Surfing Paradise
data.detailed_description:
Wildfox Surfing Paradise is a short, physics-based surfing adventure where you explore a tropical island.

  • Show off your best stunts at the beach and earn money from photoshoots
  • Surf down massive waterfalls
  • Buy new surfboards, like a rocket-powered one, to do even wilder stunts.


The sophisticated fluid simulation makes for a unique gaming experience. While the different stunts are easy to learn you will need some time to get a feeling for your board to master the waves.


The upbeat soundtrack, composed by Elliot Stone, will keep your energy levels high. Every region has its own unique music tracks.

Warning: The Early Access version only includes a tutorial and a single region. Most players will be able to finish all of the current content in 15 to 30 minutes.

data.short_description: Wildfox Surfing Paradise is a short, physics-based surfing adventure where you explore a tropical island. By doing stunts for a surfing magazine you are able to earn money and buy new surfboards.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 oder better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
